front.title: One Way Latency Considerations for MPTCP

abstract.t: This document discusses the use of One Way Latency (OWL) for enhancing multipath TCP (MPTCP). Several usages of OWL, such as retransmission policy and crucial data scheduling are analyzed. Two kinds of OWL measurement approaches are also provided and compared. More explorations related with OWL will be contribute to the performance of MPTCP.
